levels.description:
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, each attack fires off <@ba.vup>2</> arrows (prioritizing different targets), and has a <@ba.vup>{attack@prob:0%}</> chance of stunning targets for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>From second activation and on, this skill has unlimited duration</>
